animeDescription: Scifi tale of a young girl who acquires ESP powers. Based on the manga by Sasaki Junko, published in three volumes by Shougakukan under the Flower Comics label.
animeStaff: [['Hata, Masami', 'Director'], ['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', 'Sound Director'], ['Kisugi, Takao', 'Theme Song Composition'], ['Sugino, Akio', 'Animation Director, Character Design']]
